sellerCard.oneLiner: Figma UI UX Designer for Landing Page, Website and SaaS
sellerCard.description:
Welcome to Ninja Designer,

I'm Abu Saied, a highly skilled web designer specializing in Figma, UI/UX design, WordPress, and various CMS. I am not just a website creator; I craft digital masterpieces that exceed your expectations and generate sales.

What's the secret sauce? An awesome creative team with a keen eye for detail, effective collaboration, and excellent tech skills. With my expertise, I can transform your online presence into something truly enchanting.

Ready to take your online business to the next level? Let's create a functional business that will take you to new heights! ðŸŽ¯ðŸš€

description.content:
Looking for a full stack developer to build website for your business?


You're in the right place!


I'm a professional full stack website developer with years of experience in delivering high-quality custom website development solutions. Whether you need a new site from scratch or a complete overhaul of your existing site, I can help bring your vision to life.


What I Offer:


  • Custom Full Stack Website Development
  • Responsive and Mobile-Friendly Design
  • Front End and Back End Development
  • Full Integration with Payment Gateways
  • Redesign Website for Better Performance & User Experience
  • SEO Optimization for Enhanced Visibility
  • Custom Features and Functionalities


Why Choose Me?


  • Experienced Full Stack Developer & UI UX Designer
  • On-Time Delivery & Post-Delivery Support
  • 24/7 Constant Communication (Literally)


Ready to take your online presence to the next level? Let's work together to create your custom online presence!

slide.name: build website as full stack developer, website developer, front end developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is included in the custom website development service?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I build front-end and back-end websites with responsive design, payment gateway integration, SEO optimisation, and any custom features you need. A single-page static website to a multi-page business site, depending on the package, is possible.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide post-launch support and maintenance?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I offer post-launch support to ensure everything runs smoothly after your website goes live. If any issues arise, I'm available to help resolve them. Additionally, you can opt for ongoing maintenance services if you want continued updates or improvements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my website be mobile-friendly and SEO optimized?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! All websites I develop are fully responsive, ensuring they work seamlessly on mobile devices. I also implement on-page SEO best practices to improve your website's visibility in search engines and drive more traffic.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How long does it take to develop a custom website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The time required depends on the complexity of the project and the number of features or customizations you need. Basic one-page websites typically take a few days, while multi-page, fully functional websites may take a couple of weeks. Iâ€™ll provide a clear timeline once I understand requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I request changes or add custom features during the development process?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I encourage open communication throughout the development process. If you have specific requirements or wish to make changes, we can discuss and incorporate them as we move forward, ensuring the final product matches your vision.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide both front-end and back-end development services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! As a full-stack web developer, I specialize in both front-end and back-end development. This encompasses everything from designing user interfaces to developing server-side logic and integrating APIs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What technologies do you utilize for development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I work with various technologies, including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, and Vue.js for the front end. For the back end, I use Node.js, along with MySQL and MongoDB for database management. I also incorporate frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS to enhance design and functionality.

reviews.comment: Working with Abu Saied on my website development project was disappointing. The delivery was riddled with bugs, lacked attention to detail, and fell short of my expectations. Additionally, the effort seemed minimal, providing little value for the investment.

seller_response.comment: We face many serious issues regarding this project. He provided a direct order but His actual requirement was so big. Then we noticed and told him and also did not get any feedback from the draft.  But every client is a new learning for me. Also, I am committed to giving the best service to each client.
